valid_proofs.name: Basic logic
valid_proofs.code: theorem modus_ponens (p q : Prop) : p → (p → q) → q := fun hp hpq => hpq hp

valid_proofs.name: Natural number proof
valid_proofs.code: theorem add_comm_example : ∀ n m : Nat, n + m = m + n := Nat.add_comm

valid_proofs.name: Simple equality
valid_proofs.code: theorem eq_self (n : Nat) : n = n := rfl

valid_proofs.name: Zero addition
valid_proofs.code: theorem zero_add (n : Nat) : 0 + n = n := Nat.zero_add n

invalid_proofs.name: Undefined variable
invalid_proofs.code: theorem undefined_var : x + y = z := rfl
